pos review: In general you get what you see. This is not 5* hotel, so  didn't have much expectations. It was very clean, everything that is needed was there - like towels, bath utensils, coffee/tea. The bed was comfortable. The staff was friendly.
neg review: The price a little too high for this kind of place.

pos review: I fore sure visit this hotel  apartments again
neg review: It is quite area, secured and the flat is big enough and comfortable. The staff at the reception were helpful and friendly especially Valantina if l spilled her name correctly.

pos review: Great place for a great price!
neg review: Maybe, a little bit too hot because there was no air condition. But it is ok, no worry about this.

pos review: The staff is very friendly and ready to solve all your problems. Very spacious room. Good breakfast.
Clean, spacious, comfortable. Quiet area.  Mini market, grocery thereabout. Metro station close. 2-3 station the downtown.
neg review: The blanket was small. There was no dining table.
Towels need to be renewed ..new sets are a must

pos review: Nice and clean apartment, with kitchen well equipped. I came late at night, reception was working and I was checked in very quickly. Internet connection also very good.
neg review: Bit far from city center, but nice village surrounding.
